ORDER REQUIREMENTS: This product may require a minimum or maximum number of items that must/can be ordered. It may also require an even multiple of products to be ordered. These order requirements apply to this product or to all products within the specified group.

If the tax amount is provided the sales tax is calculated as the tax amount plus (any options times the tax rate), otherwise it is calculated as both (the product price and any options) times the tax rate. If the tax rate is not provided, the company tax rate is used.
Specify Shipping and handling charges for each product. The additional shipping charges for each additional item will be added to the initial shipping charge.
